pkgmetadata.longdescription: vatnumber=========Python module to validate VAT numbers.Nutshell--------Here a simple example to validate VAT numbers format:: >>> import vatnumber >>> vatnumber.check_vat('BE0123456749') TrueHere a simple example to validate European VAT through VIES service:: >>> import vatnumber >>> vatnumber.check_vies('BE0897290877') TrueFor more information please visit the `vatnumber website`_... _vatnumber website: http://code.google.com/p/vatnumber/
